Articles.Content:
Well, I call myself The Phoenix. Why? Because I rise from the ashes of my many failures...and blown up rockets...and dead kerbonauts...anyways...

I have built several rockets in-game. As mentioned before, I have had shit hit the fan many times, but usually work the gremlins out. Or throw the entire rocket in the garbage.

Just a picture of one of my proudest creations:

That pile of parts is the Pandora. You guys will probably rate the design mediocre - at best - but it's one of my most successful rockets.

I can't do much about it lol

There are about 6 parts packs in that rocket.
